articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Sends Message of Sympathy to Pakistani PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Sends Message of Sympathy to Pakistani PM
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Muhammad Nawaz Sharif, prime minister of Pakistan, in connection with the recent terrorist act in Pakistan which claimed many casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the victims and their bereaved families.
					
					 Re-clarifying the consistent stand of the DPRK government against all forms of terrorist acts, the message extended  solidarity to the government of Pakistan in its efforts to put the situation under control and preserve social security.

articles.title: CPRK Releases Information on North-South Relations
articles.content:
CPRK Releases Information on North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information Friday to let the public at home and abroad know about the actual situation of the north-south relations this year and a lesson from it. 
					 The information recalled that Marshal Kim Jong Un in the New Year address for this year expressed the firm will to bring about fresh progress in the movement for national reunification for this year true to the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. Kim Jong Un also set forth the policies of rejecting outsiders, firmly maintaining the stand of By Our Nation Itself so as to defend the security and peace of the nation and create an atmosphere for improving the north-south relations, it added.
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible sincere effort for the improvement of the north-south relations since the outset of this year, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The positive measures taken by the DPRK for mending the north-south relations throughout the year would have brought about bigger progress in the relations if they had not faced blatant challenge and obstructive moves of the anti-reunification forces who have stood for confrontation with the north.
					
					 But to our regret, the reality has been quite different.
					
					 The information cited facts to prove that the south Korean authorities responded to the DPRK's proposal and efforts for improving the north-south relations and opening up a landmark phase for national reunification by pooling the efforts of the nation with harsher policy for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The north-south relations have not made even an inch of progress, the danger of a war further increased and confrontation and distrust deepened this year due to the puppet forces' racket for confrontation with the DPRK, the information said, adding:
					
					 Lurking behind the moves for confrontation with the DPRK stepped up by the south Korean authorities, pushing the north-south relations into a catastrophe, is their absurd ambition for "unification of social systems."
					
					 The "unification of social systems", "change of the social system in the north" and "collapse" much touted by the puppet forces are nothing but a pipe dream.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that their policy for confrontation with the DPRK will not be beneficial to the improvement of the north-south relations but will only bring self-destruction.
					
					 It is the review of the north-south relations this year and a serious lesson that persistence in confrontation will only push the north-south relations into a catastrophe and that it will never help hold dialogue and improve the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should rectify its wrong confrontation policy and make a switchover in its policy if they truly hope for the dialogue and have the willingness to opt for the improvement of the north-south relations.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses in S. Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses in S. Korea Disclosed 
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Society of Measures for Human Rights in South Korea issued information on investigation into human rights abuses in south Korea on Friday to let the people at home and abroad know about the worst human rights abuses in south Korea.
					 The information in its article titled "Report on human rights abuses in south Korea in 2014" cited facts that this year, too, the crimes against humanity and human rights abuses were openly committed by GIs in south Korea, a colony of the U.S.
					
					 It said that these crimes are attributable to the puppet authorities' policy of sycophancy, treachery and submission to the U.S.
					
					 The present human rights performance in south Korea has reached an alarming phase due to the puppet group's medieval repressive rule and its unpopular and evil policy, it noted.
					
					 The information pointed to the facts that the puppet group who has not acceded to many international treaties and conventions related to human rights abused human rights by deliberately invoking outdated fascist evil laws even in the 21st century.
					
					 It accused the puppet group of making no scruple of committing brutal human rights abuses against inhabitants in the north including abduction, flesh traffic, torture and forcing defection, not content with having turned south Korea into the world's worst tundra of human rights. 
					
					 The information in an article titled "International community's review of the situation of human rights in south Korea in 2014" referred to the fact that the ferry "Sewol" sinking in the waters off Jin Island of South Jolla Province on April 16 stunned the world as it was an inhuman and anti-human rights atrocity in which the right of human beings to existence was wantonly violated. 
					
					 The puppet group is now ridiculously behaving, bluffing as if it ranked itself among "advanced states," the information noted.
					
					 The human rights situation in south Korea seen through statistics of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development clearly shows the backwardness of society, the information said, citing the figures and facts released by the organization.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The international community expresses grave concern about the evermore serious human rights abuses by the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are vociferous about "human rights" in the north after turning south Korean society into the worst tundra of human rights and a living hell. This is a mockery and challenge to the unanimous demand of the international community urging south Korea to settle the human rights abuses, and a height of shamelessness.

articles.title: Cuban Leader Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cuban Leader Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
 Havana, December 18 (KCNA) -- Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Havana on Wednesday in memory of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Cambodian King Send Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King Send Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, and Norodom Monineath Sihanouk, great queen, separately sent large floral baskets  to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on Dec. 17 honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral baskets were laid before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Vietnamese Army Day Marked
articles.content:
Vietnamese Army Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Pham Viet Hung and Le Duy Long, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the occasion of the army day of Vietnam. 
					 Present there on invitation were O Kum Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, generals and officers of the KPA, officials concerned and staff members of foreign embassies here. 
					
					 Staff members of the Vietnamese embassy here were present.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Meeting for Remembering Kim Jong Il Held at Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Meeting for Remembering Kim Jong Il Held at Embassy in Moscow
 Moscow, December 18 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting took place at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Dec. 16 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were D.T. Yazov, former Defense minister of the Soviet Union, Iosif Kovzon, first vice-chairman of the Cultural Committee of the State Duma, Vladimir Churov, chairman of the Central Election Committee, Vladimir Yakoblev, chairman of the Federation of Builders of Russia who is former mayor of Sankt-Peterburg City, Polikovsky,  the former presidential envoy to the Far East Region of Russia, Matsegora, vice department director of the Foreign Ministry, Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity, and other personages of government, political parties and organizations including the Ministry of Interior and the 21st Century Orchestra.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and staff members of his embassy were present there.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. Then they looked round photos on display on the theme of "The great Comrade Kim Jong Il will live forever."
					
					 They observed a moment's silence in the memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Those who had the honor of being received by him made speeches at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers recollected the significant days when they were received by Kim Jong Il, adding that they were greatly admired by his noble personality and profound knowledge about all fields.
					
					 They noted that the DPRK emerged a space power, nuclear power under so great difficulties thanks to his iron-willed grit and will and warm love for the people. Kim Jong Il always lives in the hearts of not only the Korean people but of the Russian people, they added. 
					
					 They expressed conviction that the traditional Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations would grow stronger under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Exhibition of Landscape Paintings and Craftworks Opens
articles.content:
Exhibition of Landscape Paintings and Craftworks Opens
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of landscape paintings and craftworks opened at the Pyongyang International House of Culture on Friday to celebrate the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					 On display in the center of the exhibition hall are the painting depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the painting depicting Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					 On display in the exhibition hall are more than 300 art pieces including Korean paintings, oil paintings, embroideries and craftworks presented by art creators from across the country. 
					
					 Korean paintings "Mt. Paektu in Morning" and "Sobaeksu Valley in Winter," acryl painting "Chongbong Secret Camp" and others help visitors recollect the precious revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu who was the most faithful to Kim Il Sung and carved out rosy future of the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 Also on display are Korean paintings "New landscape in land creating Korean speed" and "New appearance of Lake Yonphung," oil panting "Sea reporting big fish haul in morning," Korean gem-powdered painting "Masik ridge in winter" and acryl painting "Vast expanse of apple orchards at foot of Chol Pass" and others. They deal with the spirit and stirring reality of the country where the noble will and desire of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu have come true under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 On display there are also ceramic crafts, woodcrafts, gem-cutting crafts, etc. showing the creative wisdom and talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 Officials in the field of culture and art, art creators, fans and citizens including university students went round the exhibition hall on the day.

articles.title: Orangchon Power Station No. 2 Completed
articles.content:
Orangchon Power Station No. 2 Completed
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Orangchon Power Station No. 2 in North Hamgyong Province was completed with due ceremony on the spot on Friday.
					 President Kim Il Sung unfolded the plan of building the Orangchon Power Station to solve the electricity problem in the province. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, with desire to translate the President's noble intention into reality, visited the construction site of the power station several times including the one in May, Juche 99 (2010) when he underscored the need to build the power station in the best quality to be impeccable in the future as it was a valuable wealth to hand down to posterity. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, officials concerned, builders, employees of the power station and working people in Orangchon County.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the power station.

articles.title: New Medicine for Osteopathy Developed
articles.content:
New Medicine for Osteopathy Developed
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK has recently developed a new medicine efficacious for osteopathy.
					 Its main composition is fluorine, phytic acid and extracts of natural materials.
					
					 It helps adjust abnormal calcium metabolism in bone tissues and blood, thus promoting ossification.
					
					 It also takes effect in relieving osteopathic pains like lumbago.
					
					 The medicine has been proved efficacious for dental diseases, including caries, periodontitis and ozostomia.

articles.title: Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute
articles.content:
Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute is a leading vegetable research and production base of the DPRK.
					 The institute is associated with the feats of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, who in his lifetime worked heart and soul to provide the people with vegetable in all seasons.
					
					 In March Juche 100 (2011) he visited the institute and went round its hydroponic greenhouse and solar vinyl greenhouse. He appraised the successes made by it in vegetable research and production and gave an instruction to build one more greenhouse based on ultramodern technology like hydroponic greenhouse in a short period.
					
					 Later on he gave precious instructions for extension project of the institute on several occasions and showed his deep care for it until the last moments of his life.
					
					 The institute is now in the heyday of development under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Sok Won Bong, deputy director of the institute, told KCNA:
					
					 The modernly-equipped institute carries on research and production at the same time.
					
					 It has produced new species of vegetables such as yellow paprika.
					
					 Its researchers will breed more nutritious and high-yielding vegetable species, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Minju Joson Dismisses Outbursts Let Loose by Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Minju Joson Dismisses Outbursts Let Loose by Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye let loose a string of reckless remarks about the "nuclear issue of the north", "north's line of nuclear weaponization" and "human rights issue in the north" before bosses of the conservative organizations whom she invited to Chongwadae. She repeated such bullshit before foreigners. She talked such rubbish that the "north's nuclear development is the biggest factor of increasing uneasiness in Northeast Asia and a serious threat to the world peace" and " it is a contradictory policy to simultaneously push forward the nuclear development and economic construction and the "north can not succeed in the economic development without denuclearization." She went the lengths of ridiculously jabbering that "human rights of the inhabitants in the north are so serious that it is hard to describe and it is painful to think of them."
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says: The flurry of invectives let loose by Park despite repeated warnings of the DPRK is touching off bitterer resentment among all service personnel and people of the DPRK as it is an unpardonable provocation to it.
					
					 Park should take issue with the U.S. keen to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK with tens of thousands of nukes and make an official apology for staging north-targeted nuclear war exercises in conclusion with the U.S. and stop conducting such saber-rattling, the commentary notes and goes on:
					
					 Park is raising a hue and cry over "threat from the north's nukes," shelving her own crimes. This behavior only reveals her ugly true colors as the puppet and poor stooge of her master U.S.
					
					 If Park is truly concerned for human rights issue, she should denounce the U.S. set to sit in the dock of the international human rights tribunal for killing innocent young black men one after another and practicing thrice-cursed tortures and repent of her criminal act of having turned south Korea into the worst tundra of human rights.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Remarks about "Followers of North" under Fire
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Remarks about "Followers of North" under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement on Dec. 15 blasting the puppet chief executive's reckless remarks about "followers of the north".
					 The statement accused Park Geun Hye of labeling the lecture given by Sin Un Mi, a Korean professor in the U.S., and Hwang Son, a progressive activist, "activities for following the north aimed at stirring up the social conflict" at a meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae held on the same day.
					
					 Recalling that she personally branded them as "followers of the north" at a time when the police authorities are now investigating their activities, the statement held that her behavior is aimed at preventing the proper investigation and deter the truth from being probed by dint of power.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Worse still, Park did not mention a terrorist act of throwing inflammables when their lecture was under way.
					
					 If Park is truly concerned about the social conflict, she should not to check the activities for helping people understand the north properly but sternly punish the violent terrorist.
					
					 Park Geun Hye should immediately retract her foolish and unreasonable remarks about the "followers of the north".

articles.title: Ruling Party Accused of Laying Obstacle in Probing Truth behind Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Ruling Party Accused of Laying Obstacle in Probing Truth behind Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News on Dec. 14 carried an editorial denouncing the puppet ruling party for laying obstacle in the way of probing the truth behind the ferry "Sewol" disaster. 
					 The editorial said that the special committee to be established according to the special law for ferry "Sewol" should probe the truth about the disaster and has heavy responsibility to take measures to prevent the recurrence of similar case.
					
					 Those who were nominated by the "Saenuri Party" as members of the committee are the guys with biased political ideas bereft of the minimum will to probe truth, it noted, adding this is an ulterior intention to disturb the investigation into the rescue operations which failed due to the irresponsibility on the part of the "government".
					
					 The editorial demanded the "Saenuri Party" withdraw the unreasonable nomination of members of the committee.

articles.title: Foot-and-mouth Disease Breaks out in More Areas of S. Korea
articles.content:
Foot-and-mouth Disease Breaks out in More Areas of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Foot-and-mouth disease broke out in South Chungchong Province of south Korea while it is rapidly spreading in North Chungchong Province. 
					 The CBS of south Korea on Dec. 17 said that the foot-and-mouth disease virus was found in the examination of pigs on a farm in Chonan City of South Chungchong Province.

articles.title: Dismissed Workers Wage Stay-in Strike in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dismissed Workers Wage Stay-in Strike in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Two dismissed workers under the Ssangyong Motors branch of the Metal Workers Trade Union of south Korea waged stay-in strike on the 70m-high chimney in a factory of Ssangyong Motors in Phyongthaek, Kyonggi Province on Dec. 13, according to the KBS of south Korea. 
					 The puppet Supreme Court on Nov. 13 gave a decision that the indiscriminate layoff of workers made by the Ssangyong Motors side was "not mistake but a legal one that was needed under the pressing management situation." 
					
					 The dismissed workers angry at this step launched the sit-in strike denouncing the measure of the Supreme Court standing by the management side. 
					
					 They declared that they would stage the struggle together with other workers until the problem of Ssangyong Motors is settled.

articles.title: Monument to Kim Jong Il's Visit to Khabarovsk Erected in Russia
articles.content:
Monument to Kim Jong Il's Visit to Khabarovsk Erected in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A monument to leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Khabarovsk City was erected at the Utsos observation platform in the City to commemorate the anniversary of his visit to the City of the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation.
					 Carved on the monument in Korean and Russian are the words "Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, visited Khabarovsk City on August 17, 2001."
					
					 A ceremony of unveiling the monument was held on Dec. 16.
					
					 It was attended by personages and people from all social strata in Khabarovsk Territory of Russia, and staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka and officials of various units of the DPRK working in Khabarovsk City were present there on invitation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The director for Protocol and International Relations of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration said that Kim Jong Il was a great man who performed great feats in the development of the Russia-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 Thanks to his feats, today the Russia-DPRK friendly relations are developing on good terms in various fields.
					
					 The monument is a manifestation of the profound respect of the citizens of the City for him and will remain an eternal symbol of Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The deputy minister of Culture of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration congratulated the participants in the ceremony on the erection of the monument and its successful unveiling.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the culture and art of the DPRK have reached a very high level, by which we are deeply moved.
					
					 He will always be remembered by not only the Korean people but also the people of Russia along with the monument.
					
					 The first deputy chairman of the Khabarovsk Territorial Legislative Assembly who is also secretary of Khabarovsk Regional Political Council of the United Russia Party expressed the belief that the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties would grow stronger in all fields.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were placed before the monument.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Kim Jong Il Held by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A memorial service of the General Association of Koreans in China was held in Shenyang, China on Dec. 16 to commemorate the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Floral baskets were placed by the general association and organizations under the association before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il at the conference hall of the association. 
					
					 It was attended by officials of the association, representatives of organizations under it, Korean nationals in Shenyang, lecturers group of veteran soldiers of the Chinese People's Volunteers, the Association of Korean Elders in Shenyang and members of various other organizations and the consul-general of the DPRK in Shenyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, said in her memorial address:
					
					 Reverberating far and wide are songs of boundless reverence, songs of yearning sung by all service personnel and people on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il, missing him very much who passed away on a running train while making high-intensity forced march to mix with people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 It is great fortune and honor of the Korean nation to hold Marshal Kim Jong Un, another outstanding great man, in high esteem as supreme leader, she said, adding that thanks to him Kim Jong Il will always live in the hearts of Koreans while the Juche revolutionary cause will make a triumphant advance. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the service.
					
					 At the end of the service the participants watched a Korean film dealing with the undying feats of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A photo exhibition was held on the same day.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Thongil, newspaper of Koreans in Uzbekistan, on Dec. 11 carried a special write-up to observe the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The paper carried a photo of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill. 
					
					 The paper conveyed news of Marshal Kim Jong Un inspecting units of the Korean People's Army (KPA). 
					
					 It said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un inspected KPA Unit 1313 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment where he stressed the need to more thoroughly prepare the service personnel politically and ideologically and in military technique. 
					
					 He listened to the contents of lectures given at a political lecture at the unit and examined the operational plan. 
					
					 Soldiers of the KPA should undergo effective training on the basis of concrete information on the enemy and steadily improve the training methods and programs, he noted. 
					
					 Then he guided a pistol-firing drill of commanding officers and company commanders and political instructors of the unit.
					
					 He had a photo session with the service personnel after giving them a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts.
					
					 He also inspected the Artillery Company under KPA Unit 963 which started the new year combat and political drill. He gave an instruction to conduct various forms of combat drills under the simulated conditions of an actual war.

articles.title: Korean Professor in US Asserts Justice of Her Lecture on Reunification
articles.content:
Korean Professor in US Asserts Justice of Her Lecture on Reunification
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Prof. Sin Un Mi, a Korean living in the U.S., asserted the justice of her lectures on reunification before the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency on Dec. 15, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Displeased with the lectures through which she gave impressions of what she had seen during her visit to the DPRK, the south Korean regime persecuted her for praising the north and eventually started a coercive investigation into her.
					
					 Strongly protesting against the unjust action of the authorities, she explained how she gave lectures on reunification.
					
					 She said that she was just a common housewife.
					
					 She stressed that she got to know that beloved brothers and sisters were living there through her visit to the north.
					
					 This helped her have awareness that reunification is an idea common to the nation and prompted her to desire it and give such lectures, she added.
					
					 Meanwhile, Sin's lawyer chided the chief executive for terming Sin's and Hwang Son's lectures "pro-north activities" at the meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae, adding that it was a matter of concern that this would be pressure on the investigation institution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Pisateli Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 12.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are a mighty political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly meet the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Mexico
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was published in pamphlet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico  on Dec. 9.
					 The work published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998) deals with the 5-point policy for the great national unity which serves as important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Austrian Organization on Internet
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Austrian Organization on Internet
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Austrian committee for honoring the memory of HE Kim Jong Il posted a brief biography of Kim Jong Il on the website of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on Dec. 11.
					 Also posted on the website was the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Internet Seminar Held on Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
articles.content:
Internet Seminar Held on Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A Latin American and Caribbean regional internet seminar was held on Dec. 12 on the occasion of the third anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Present at the major seminar were representatives of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and other Peruvian political parties and public organizations.
					
					 They paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, made a report. 
					
					 He said: Kim Jong Il was a great leader who succeeded to the cause of President Kim Il Sung and steered the Korean revolution and socialist cause to victory. 
					
					 He shattered the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist forces and their stooges with his Songun politics, firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation and the destiny of socialism. 
					
					 Not only the Koreans but other people praise his efforts and exploits for putting an end to the country's division forced by outside forces and building a reunified Korea and prospering country.
					
					 Jose Francisco Aguilar Bulgarelli, honorary chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, said in a speech that Kim Jong Il is boundlessly respected by all peoples as a great man. 
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, noted Kim Jong Il is alive in the hearts of Korean people for his dedication to the people till the last moments of his life. 
					
					  Diego Antonio Rivero, chairman of the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, praised Kim Jong Il for leading the DPRK and the Korean people to victory and providing progressive humankind with the most precious revolutionary pabulum.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included memorial meetings in Russia and Pakistan and a book exhibition and film show in Nigeria from Dec. 8 to 11.
					
					 Displayed at their venues were photos dealing with the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and publications introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Korean film "Okryu Children's Hospital" was shown.
					
					 A vice chairman of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory praised Kim Jong Il as a great statesman and people's leader who is boundlessly respected by the international community as a world elder statesman for his great exploits performed for defending socialist Korea and building a thriving nation when the DPRK was experiencing the hardest time. 
					
					 The principal of the Ali Ali School in Karachi of Pakistan praised Kim Jong Il for performing undying exploits for the Korean revolution and cause of global independence, holding aloft the banner of independence and Songun.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Pakistan.

articles.title: National Seminar Held in India
articles.content:
National Seminar Held in India
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place in New Delhi, India on Dec. 13 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were publications introducing the victorious and glorious history of Songun Korea.
					
					 Present at the seminar were personages of political, economic and academic circles and media persons and members of the Juche idea study organizations of India and the director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to India and staff members of the embassy.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence to the memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made by the chairman of the Delhi Bureau for Rural Development, the director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, the chairperson of the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics and other personages.
					
					 The speakers said that Kim Jong Il passed away but he still leads the Korean people and world progressives to victory with the brilliant rays of the great Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 They praised him as a peerless statesman, iron-willed commander with matchless grit, tender-hearted father of people and staunch defender of the socialist cause.
					
					 They referred to the undying exploits he performed on behalf of the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: CRPP publica la informacion referente a relaciones intercoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP publica la informacion referente a relaciones intercoreanas
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 19 una informacion para dar a conocer la situacion actual de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y las lecciones sacadas este ano.
					El documento recuerda que en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un expuso la firme voluntad de lograr el presente ano nuevos avances en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria en acato al legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y presento las orientaciones de rechazar la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras, mantener con firmeza el principio de Entre nosotros, los connacionales, salvaguardar la seguridad y la paz de la nacion y crear el ambiente favorable a mejorar las relaciones N-S.
					
					Desde principios del ano en curso, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo todo lo posible para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, subraya el documento y continua:
					
					Si las medidas activas de la RPDC tomadas este ano para la mejora de las relaciones N-S no se hubieran chocado con el brutal desafio y las maniobras obstructoras de las fuerzas conflictivas anti- reunificacion, se habrian logrado notables avances en las relaciones N-S.
					
					Pero, lamentablemente la realidad marcho en contra de nuestros esfuerzos.
					
					A la propuesta y los esfuerzos de la RPDC por mejorar entre los connacionales las relaciones N-S y abrir la fase trascendental de la reunificacion de la patria, las autoridades del Sur de Corea respondieron con la persistente politica de confrontacion con RPDC.
					
					Debido a la campana conflictiva de la banda surcoreana, las relaciones intercoreanas no pudieron dar ni un paso adelante en este ano, por el contrario, se agravaron el peligro de guerra, el enfrentamiento y la desconfianza.
					
					En el trasfondo de esa campana anti-RPDC de las autoridades surcoreanas que llevaron a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas, esta su irrealizable ilusion tal como la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					La  "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes", el "cambio de regimen norcoreano" y su "derrumbe", de que los titeres surcoreanos hablan ruidosamente, son delirios nunca realizables.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que su politica conflictiva anti-RPDC es totalmente inutil que causa solo la catastrofe de relaciones intercoreanas y se busca la autodestruccion. 
					
					Tales relaciones de este ano ensenan la seria leccion de que las relaciones Norte-Sur no podran evitar la ruptura total ni habran el dialogo y la mejora de relaciones si las autoridades surcoreanas siguen recurriendo al enfrentamiento.
					
					Si ellas desean de veras el dialogo y tienen la voluntad de mejorar relaciones intercoreanas, deben corregir cuanto antes su erronea politica conflictiva y cambiarla.

articles.title: Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en Sur de Corea publica informacion de investigacion
articles.content:
Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en Sur de Corea publica informacion de investigacion
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea publico el dia 19 una informacion con el fin de delatar a todo el mundo la horrible situacion de violacion de DDHH en el Sur de Corea.
					En el titulado "Informe sobre la situacion de violacion de DDHH de 2014 en el Sur de Corea", la informacion revela con datos que este ano, en el Sur de Corea, colonia de Estados Unidos, las tropas norteamericanas cometieron sin escrupulos los crimenes antieticos y anti-DDHH.
					
					Estos delitos son productos de la politica de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas, serviles a EE.UU. y sumisas a grandes potencias, critico el documento y continuo:
					
					Hoy dia, la situacion de DDHH del Sur de Corea llega a la fase deplorable debido a la gobernacion represiva medieval de la banda surcoreana y su infame politica antipopular.
					
					El Sur de Corea no firma todavia muchos tratados y convenios internacionales en materia de DDHH. En la epoca civilizada del siglo XXI, practica las infames leyes fascistas cometiendo actos de violacion de DDHH.
					
					Insatisfecha de haber convertido todo el territorio surcoreano en un infierno para los DDHH, la banda surcoreana rapta y secuestra, trafica, tortura e impone el "sometimiento" a los habitantes norcoreanos violando flagrantemente sus derechos humanos.
					
					En el articulo intitulado "Evaluacion de la sociedad internacional sobre el estado de derechos humanos del Sur de Corea en 2014", la informacion subraya que el caso de hundimiento del ferry "Sewol", ocurrido el 16 de abril en el mar frente a la isla Jin de la provincia de Jolla del Sur, deviene un crimen antietico y anti-DDHH que violo el derecho a la vida del hombre y dejo consternado al mundo entero.
					
					Hoy dia, los titeres surcoreanos se portan ridiculamente como si hubieran sido registrados en la llamada lista de "paises avanzados".
					
					Pero, la situacion de DDHH del Sur de Corea observada con estadisticas de la Organizacion de Cooperacion Economica y Desarrollo (ODCE) deja conocer claramente lo retrasado de la sociedad surcoreana en ese aspecto.
					
					La sociedad internacional expresa seria preocupacion por la agravante situacion de DDHH en el Sur de Corea.
					
					La nota concluye afirmando que los titeres surcoreanos cuestionan atrevidamente el supuesto problema de "derechos humanos" de alguien burlandose y desafiando a la unanime demanda de la sociedad internacional que exige la solucion del problema de derechos humanos del Sur de Corea.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion de pinturas, bordados y productos artesanales por 24 de diciembre
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion de pinturas, bordados y productos artesanales por 24 de diciembre
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 19 en la Casa Internacional de Cultura de Pyongyang la exposicion nacional de  paisajes, bordados y productos artesanales por el 97o aniversario de natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijapoanesa Kim Jong Suk.
					En el centro del lugar estaban exhibidas las obras pictoricas alusivas al Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina.
					
					Ademas, se veian mas de 300 obras de bellas artes inclusive las pinturas al estilo coreano, al oleo, bordados y artesania creadas por los  pintores de distintos lugares.
					
					Las pinturas al estilo coreano "Manana en el Monte Paektu" y "Valle de Sobaeksu en invierno", la acrilica "Campamento secreto en Chongbong" y otras hacen recordar la vida y las hazanas de la Heroina del Monte Paektu quien seguia con mas fidelidad al Presidente y preparo el radiante futuro para el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Figuran tambien las pinturas al estilo coreano "Nuevo paisaje describiendo la creacion de velocidad de Corea" y "Nuevo paisaje en el lago Yonphung", al oleo "Manana del mar lleno de recursos acuaticos", la pintura al estilo coreano hecha con polvos de piedras preciosas "Monte Masik en invierno" y la acrilica "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol" y otras.
					
					Tambien, estaban expuestos los productos artesanales elaborados con piedra, madera y jade que demuestran la inteligencia y el talento del pueblo coreano.
					
					La exposicion fue visitada por los funcionarios de la rama de cultura y arte,  creadores de bellas artes, aficionados,  trabajadores y estudiantes capitalinos.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta nuevo disparate de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta nuevo disparate de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye invito a Chongwadae a los cabecillas de las entidades conservadoras y cuestiono ante ellos el "problema nuclear", la "linea de armamento nuclear" y el "problema de derechos humanos" del Norte de Corea. Dijo asi tambien a los extranjeros con que se ha reunido.
					Igualmente, pronuncio otros chismes tales como el "desarrollo nuclear del Norte de Corea constituye el mayor factor de inestabilidad en el Noreste Asiatico y seria amenaza para la paz del mundo", "es contradictoria la politica de impulsar paralelamente el desarrollo de arma nuclear y la construccion economica" y "no se puede lograr el desarrollo economico sin desnuclearizacion".
					
					Asimismo, expresa ridiculamente que "le duele mucho la deplorable situacion de DDHH de la poblacion norcoreana".
					
					Esa chismografia que dice Park a pesar de las repetidas advertencias de la RPDC es una provocacion imperdonable que monta en colera al ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC, subrayo el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 19.
					
					La mandataria surcoreana debe cuestionar primero a Estados Unidos, que trata de provocar la guerra nuclear de agresion a la RPDC con decenas de miles de armas nucleares, pedir disculpas por los ejercicios de guerra nuclear que realiza en contubernio con su amo norteamericano, y no repetirlos nunca mas en lo adelante, insistio el comentarista.
					
					Ella habla tanto de la "amenaza nuclear del Norte" dejando a un lado sus crimenes, lo que demuestra su fachada de lacaya del amo gringo, apunto.
					
					Prosiguio que si Park esta interesada de veras en el problema de DDHH, debe condenar primero a EE.UU. criticado ahora por la opinion publica mundial por los asesinatos sucesivos de jovenes negros y las torturas escalofriantes.
					
					Ademas, ha de reflexionar sus crimenes de haber convertido el Sur de Corea en la tierra privada de DDHH, concluyo.
